overview: "After overcoming various obstacles, Yaozu and his childhood sweetheart Jingjing are finally together. Unfortunately, this doesn't last long. Jingjing leaves Yaozu for some reason, and they miss out on getting together. When they meet again, it’s at Yaozu's wedding. Faced with his new love and old love, how should Yaozu choose..."
title: If at First: Dramatic Fantasia
